snippet: Among Republican fiscal hawks, the 2012 election is supposed to be a stark choice between a Republican Party willing to make tough spending decisions and a Democratic Party relying on "Mediscare" tactics to avoid responsibility.
abstract: Among Republican fiscal hawks, the 2012 election is supposed to be a stark choice between a Republican Party willing to make tough spending decisions and a Democratic Party relying on "Mediscare" tactics to avoid responsibility.

headline.main: For Republicans, Clear Approach to Medicare Has Many Sides
